subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City showed no mercy on beleaguered West Ham by romping to a 3-0 victory in the second leg of their English League Cup semifinal, completing a 9-0 aggregate thrashing.
snippet: Manchester City showed no mercy on beleaguered West Ham by romping to a 3-0 victory in the second leg of their English League Cup semifinal, completing a 9-0 aggregate thrashing.
